regen.absent_element: ensuring command can correctly influence a device in degraded mode
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure command execution can correctly control a device even while in degraded mode, assuming the device sensors report a valid status.

regen.absent_element: continuous verification of database readings for sensor status.
regen.new_specification: The system shall continuously verify the output status from database readings for reliability of sensor statuses.

regen.absent_element: actions to take when a device sensor has an invalid or bad status
regen.new_specification: The system shall log an alert and attempt to re-establish communication if a device sensor is detected to have an invalid or bad status.

label: The system shall abort the device if the status is unknown.
absence: situation of the device status is unknown
